item.title: Removing @objc inference warnings when migrating from Swift3 to Swift4
item.description: When I switch from Xcode8 to Xcode9 and convert to Swift4, I get the following error. Here's how to make it disappear. The use of Swift 3 @objc inference in Swift 4 mode is deprecated.
